about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Ducol Organics And Colours Limited offer a range of pigment dispersions for various industries. They offer products like Paints, Ink, Textile, Detergent, Paper, Rubber, and Plastics color solutions. They primarily engage in the business of manufacturing and selling of pigment dispersions, preparations, concentrates, paste colorants, and master batches.

Having such a broad product display and Pan-India customer base, the company serves a variety of entities and industries including paints, ink, textile, rubber, plastic, leather, paper, soaps, detergents, and FMCG.

For manufacturing, Ducol Organics And Colours has established two well-equipped and operating facilities located in Taloja. The company has a third manufacturing unit at Mahad in process of getting established with trials currently being conducted.

The products of Ducol Organics And Colours are:

  1. Dutint - water based dispersions for decorative paints
  2. Duplast - MB for plastic industry
  3. Duprint - water based dispersion for printing ink formulations
  4. Dutex - pigment pastes for textile printing industry
  5. Dusperse - for soap and detergent industry
  6. Dupralin - for paper industry
  7. Dupren - used in rubber industry
  8. Ducem - Dry dispersions various general applications

The company has obtained ISO 9001: 2015 certification for the first two unit situated in Taluja MIDC. The first unit has a capacity of 3,500 MTPA for Wet Dispersions whereas the second unit has capacity of 2,000 MTPA for Master Batch, and 10,000 MTPA for Dry Dispersions. With the third unit, soon to be started, the company will be able to expand its capacity and deliver its products more efficiently.

faqs.question: What is the Ducol Organics And Colours IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ducol Organics And Colours IPO is a SME IPO of 4040000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹31.51 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 9, 2023, and closes on January 11, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ducol Organics And Colours IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ducol Organics And Colours IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ducol Organics And Colours IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ducol Organics And Colours IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ducol Organics And Colours IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ducol Organics And Colours IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ducol Organics And Colours IPO opens on January 9, 2023 and closes on January 11, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ducol Organics And Colours IPO?
faqs.answer: Ducol Organics And Colours IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ducol Organics And Colours IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ducol Organics And Colours IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ducol Organics And Colours IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ducol Organics And Colours IPO will be done on Monday, January 16, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 18, 2023. Check the Ducol Organics And Colours IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ducol Organics And Colours IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ducol Organics And Colours IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 19, 2023.
